original_title: Station Masters to launch sudden strike
original_body_lines: Colombo, March 14 (Daily Mirror) - The Sri Lanka Railways Station Masters' Union (SLRSMU) has decided to launch a sudden trade union action at 4 p.m today, in protest of the seat reservation system without providing any information to the station masters.
A crucial discussion with the General Manager - Railways is being held at this moment.
The General Secretary of the union said that a discussion with the Transport Ministry Secretary is to be held at 2.30 pm.
